decision_reasoning: fear of persecution linked to perceived political opinion
past interactions with LTTE and SLA
likelihood of being perceived as an LTTE member or sympathizer

procedure_followed: judicial review of Board Member's decision
arguments focused on standards of proof, factual findings, nexus to Convention grounds
result_of_case: no errors in application of legal standards or factual determinations
